children.name: p
children: To contribute with webhooks.fyi, send us a
. Ideas and how to contribute below.

content.name: p
children: As we surveyed the webhooks ecosystem for implementations, we started with the top ~150 we could think of, discover, and find examples for, and narrowed our focus to the top 100 measured by sentiment, traffic, and interest from informal polling. We didn't include every webhook provider here but want to expand this to be more comprehensive.

content.name: p
children: If we missed your favorite webhooks or even your company's webhooks, please feel free to add a pull request filling in the blanks.

content.name: p
children: If something changed or we documented something wrong, let us know!

content.name: p
children: Ideally, submit a pull request. Alternatively, file an issue. Either way, please link to the webhook provider's docs so we can confirm.

content.name: p
children: Note: We want easily observable facts, not subjective ratings of webhooks, APIs, etc.

children.name: li
children: Use the instructions in README.md to deploy locally

children.name: li
children: Add your changes (most likely to markdown files under

children.name: li
children: Confirm that pages still render properly

children.name: li
children: Submit a pull request with links to relevant docs

content.name: p
children: We didn't get to add every webhook we wanted, and we would love to include more under

frontmatter.title: How to contribute
frontmatter.description: How to contribute to our content, report mistakes, and add vendors to the webhook directory
